channel.title: CVE Feed for F-Secure -- F-Secure Mobile Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F-Secure -- F-Secure Mobile Security

item.title: CVE-2022-28868|2024-08-03T06:03:53.153Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20mobile%20security
item.description: An Address bar spoofing vulnerability was discovered in Safe Browser for Android. When user clicks on a specially crafted malicious webpage/URL, user may be tricked for a short period of time (until the page loads) to think content may be coming from a valid domain, while the content comes from the attacker controlled site.

item.title: CVE-2022-28873|2024-08-03T06:03:53.217Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20mobile%20security
item.description: A vulnerability affecting F-Secure SAFE browser was discovered. An attacker can potentially exploit Javascript window.open functionality in SAFE Browser which could lead address bar spoofing attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-28869|2024-08-03T06:03:53.135Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20mobile%20security
item.description: A vulnerability affecting F-Secure SAFE browser was discovered. A maliciously crafted website could make a phishing attack with address bar spoofing as the browser did not show full URL, such as port number.

item.title: CVE-2022-28872|2024-08-03T06:03:53.215Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20mobile%20security
item.description: A vulnerability affecting F-Secure SAFE browser was discovered. A maliciously crafted website could make a phishing attack with address bar spoofing as the address bar was not correct if navigation fails in a loop.

item.title: CVE-2022-28870|2024-08-03T06:03:53.215Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20mobile%20security
item.description: A vulnerability affecting F-Secure SAFE browser was discovered. A maliciously crafted website could make a phishing attack with address bar spoofing as the address bar was not correct if navigation fails.
